div.div:
Because computer data is organized in 8-bit bytes →
when encoding using any base-2ⁿ format,
the required bit grouping (n) determines the
smallest block size where input bytes (8 bits) and
output characters (n bits) align perfectly, which
is LCM(8, n)."
